mapper.select: select count(*) from TB_SEARCH where ( S_TITLE like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ) or ( S_CONTENT like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' )

select * from (select rownum rnum, S_NO, S_MENU, S_TITLE, S_CONTENT, S_DATE, S_CRUID, S_ID, S_CTID, S_TID from (select * from TB_SEARCH where ( S_TITLE like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ) or ( S_CONTENT like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ) order by s_no desc)) where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }
